Module com.kihachu.spaceiteration1
Package com.kihachu.spaceiteration1.model

Class CelestialBody

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.shape.Shape3D
javafx.scene.shape.Sphere
com.kihachu.spaceiteration1.model.CelestialBody
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class CelestialBody extends javafx.scene.shape.Sphere
Represents a celestial body in the universe, such as a planet or a star. Provides functionality for setting and getting its position, name, and color.

  • Property Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • CelestialBody

      public CelestialBody(String name, double radius, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, String texturePath)
      Constructs a CelestialBody object with the specified name, radius, color, and texture path.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the celestial body.
      radius - the radius of the celestial body.
      color - the color of the celestial body.
      texturePath - the path to the texture image file.

      y - the Y coordinate.
      z - the Z coordinate.

    • getPosition

      public double[] getPosition()

    • createCelestialBody

      public static CelestialBody createCelestialBody(String name, double radius, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, double x, double y, double z, String texturePath)
      Creates a new CelestialBody object with the specified properties and position.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the celestial body.
      radius - the radius of the celestial body.
      color - the color of the celestial body.
      x - the X coordinate of the celestial body's position.
      y - the Y coordinate of the celestial body's position.
      z - the Z coordinate of the celestial body's position.
      texturePath - the path to the texture image file.
      Returns:
      the newly created CelestialBody object.
